page.title: 07Life Styles
page.content: {Fashion}for young people there are a few fashion shops to buy clothes at. Fashion for girls,at the moment consists of pastel shades in separates,with square tops and V-backs.Creased white cotton trousers are also fashionable together with cotton jackets and flying suits. Also in vogue are pastel, chunky,beads,matching bangles and earings.Black and white splash pattern dresses are also popular. For{boys}"swanker" jeans and jackets.Denims with zips and zip pockets. Leather look bomber jackets.Stretch jeans and T-shirts. {Make-up,}is worn by some young people(under 12yrs old). It is mainly blusher eye-shadow and eye liner. {Hair-styles}are shaggy perms and highlights for girls.Shaved sides for boys and thick on top.
